Product design as an agent of change

I began my career affecting system change â€“ negotiating land easements with the Nature Conservancy and developing ecological tourism initiatives in the Peace Corps.

Curious about the relationship between design and human behavior, I began exploring how systems influence our decisions, focusing my career on the design of the interface between humans and computers. I am passionate about the evolving, collaborative role of technology and have a strong sense of duty to shape that role responsibly.
